name: Revenge the village
description:
Do you think you can reach the goal of this hard and fast-paced game? Try your best!

How to play:

Arrows - Move

X - Jump

Z - Interact

How to Install:

1 - Download Shroom Editor.

2 - Download the files.

3 - Open the Shroom Editor folder and then the "Level" folder.

4 - Drag and Drop the files on the "Level" folder

5 - Start up Shroom editor and select the level you want to play and have fun!

This game was made on Shroom Editor by Hello Fangaming, go give them support.

Feel free to evaluate this game here: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1H8HVbM4GjLdGLMPvETKfhXb0FnVY80aW_0TM89U7bDw/edi...
